marklogic.body: Great review! You addressed some of the things about which I'd been wondering. I enjoyed the books as well, but felt the writing was rather clunky in Spots; this is one where I think the film may well surpass the book. My girlfriend doesn't want to see it at all, unfortunately, so I'll probably wind up having to wait for the DVD/Bluray release. Glad to hear so much positive buzz about it, all the same.
